about.label: About me
about.description:
Hey there! I'm Sebasti√°n, a software developer with an affinity for all things related to web development. I've been creating things on the internet since my teenage years, toying around with game APIs and Python scripts. Fast forward to today, I've got studies in software engineering, and I've gained valuable work experience as a developer under my belt.

Most of my work experience has been focused on frontend development, making it the best skill in my toolbox. However, I love to dabble on both sides of development, especially when it comes to personal projects with the MERN stack.

I'm a firm believer in constantly learning and evolving, and I always strive to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends. When I'm not busy coding, chances are you can find me lifting weights, swimming or playing some video games.
